Package Users

Class Staff

java.lang.Object
Users.User
Users.Staff
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnquiryReplyInterface, ApproveSuggestionInterface
public class Staff extends User implements EnquiryReplyInterface, ApproveSuggestionInterface
The class represents a staff member involved in managing camps. It extends the User class and implements interfaces for handling enquiries and approving suggestions. The class includes methods for managing camps, handling enquiries, approving suggestions, and generating reports.

    • getOwnCamps

      public List<Camp> getOwnCamps()
      Returns the list of camps that current staff is in charged of. To prevent circular referencing ownCamps is only loaded when getOwnCamps is called.
      Returns:
      ownCamps Lists of camps that current staff is in charged of.
